text: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

translation.en: Degrees [of high position] from Him and forgiveness and mercy. And Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful
translation.id: (yaitu) beberapa derajat dari pada-Nya, serta ampunan dan rahmat. Allah Maha Pengampun, Maha Penyayang
